subject: FW: Flock deployment map
body:
Good morning Caroline, 

 

I sent this email to our traffic engineering contact, Bret Jones.  

 

Bret, 

I have two questions I was hoping you could help me with as we are identifying camera locations for the LPR system.  

1.	For the below intersections, they are listed as ODOT:  Are these existing infrastructure at these locations maintained by COE and/or do you have a contact with ODOT?

*	F#024 SR 99 @ Roosevelt Blvd NB - SR 99 is ODOT ROW 
*	F#025 SR 99 @ Barger Dr NB - SR 99 is ODOT ROW
*	F#038 Franklin Bl @ Walnut St WB - Franklin (SR99) ODOT 

2.	Can you confirm if infrastructure at these locations is maintained by COE or county?

 

*	F#019 Club Rd @ I105 SBF#031 Club Rd @ I105 NB
*	F#044 River Rd @ Willow Springs Dr SB
*	F#045 Green Acres Rd @ N Delta Hwy EB
*	F#056 N Delta Hwy @ Randy Pape Beltline NB

 

 

See his responses below in the email thread.  Summarized, he said the intersections in questions #1 are COE owned and maintained, and he is checking with his ODOT contact about availability to place equipment at the other locations.  Meanwhile, Derek is working on alternate sites in case ODOT does not allow us to place cameras.  

 

 

I have some other questions about contract language that I would like to speak with you about.  Do you have time for a quick call today?

 

Thanks

 

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work

 

 



 

From: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov> 
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 7:21 AM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: RE: Flock deployment map

 

Have a call out to my Region 2 contact and will let you know what I hear.

 

Bret Jones

Traffic Operations

City of Eugene

O:541-682-4908

C:541-228-5722

 

From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2025 7:17 AM
To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: RE: Flock deployment map

 

Good morning, thank you Bret.  Also, if they don�t want it on their equipment, Flock can put it on their own pole  but would be on ODOT property. 

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work

 

 



 

From: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > 
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 6:11 AM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: RE: Flock deployment map

 

Morning Jake,

 

All the signals in question #1 are ours. I will check in with ODOT to see how they feel about deploying them on the signals they own. 

 

Bret Jones

Traffic Operations

City of Eugene

O:541-682-4908

C:541-228-5722

 

From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2025 4:46 AM
To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: Re: Flock deployment map

 

Thank you Bret.  If we maintain all those under question 1, are they owned by ODOT?  

 

Do you have a point of contact with ODOT that you can provide?  Trying to figure out if those intersections are off limits or not. 

 

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work

 

 

 



 

________________________________

From: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 4:39:47 AM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: Re: Flock deployment map 

 

Jake,

 

We maintain all of the intersections listed under your first question. 

 

We own and maintain River and Willow Springs.The other intersections for question 2 are owned by ODOT and maintained by us. However ramps at those intersections are maintained by ODOT.

 

Thanks,

Bret

 

Get Outlook for iOS https://aka.ms/o0ukef
